weekly_top_story.headline: Iran Seizes Two Foreign Oil Tankers in Persian Gulf Over Fuel Smuggling Claims
weekly_top_story.summary: Iran's seizure of two foreign oil tankers and 15 crew members in the Persian Gulf escalates regional tensions amid ongoing US-Iran frictions following last year's nuclear facility bombings, potentially disrupting global oil supply routes.

stories.headline: Storm Leonardo brings heavy rain, flooding to Spain and Portugal
stories.summary: Storm Leonardo has caused heavy rain and widespread flooding across Spain and Portugal, highlighting Europe's vulnerability to extreme weather events amid climate change.

stories.headline: Russia and Ukraine exchange 157 prisoners each in rare swap
stories.summary: Russia and Ukraine conducted a rare prisoner exchange of 157 individuals each, signaling a brief de-escalation in their protracted conflict and offering hope for humanitarian progress.

stories.headline: India and the United States are close to sealing a bilateral trade pact
stories.summary: India and the US are nearing a bilateral trade agreement within 4-5 days, building on $190 billion in annual trade, which could reshape global supply chains and economic ties.
